Rulings.Edison:
● The only way you can Special Summon this card is via its own procedure.
Even if it was initially summoned that way, you still can't summon it with card effects.
Rulings.Tengu:
● The only way you can Special Summon this card is via its own procedure.
Even if it was initially summoned that way, you still can't summon it with card effects.
Rulings.Goat:
●Spirit of the Pharaoh cannot be Normal Summoned or Set, and cannot be Special Summoned EXCEPT by the effect of The First Sarcophagus. So Spirit of the Pharaoh cannot be Special Summoned with Monster Reborn, etc., even if Special Summoned properly first.
●If your opponent chains Royal Decree to the effect of The First Sarcophagus, the effect of Special Summoning is negated and The First Sarcophagus is sent to the GY because that is the cost.
●If Banisher of the Light is in play and you activate The First Sarcophagus, you cannot Special Summon Spirit of the Pharaoh.
●You select the Zombie monsters when you successfully Special Summon Spirit of the Pharaoh, then activate his effect.
●Spirit of the Pharaoh's effect targets.
●You can choose whether or not to activate Spirit of the Pharaoh's effect, but if you activate it you must Special Summon at least 1 Zombie monster.
●If you have Stumbling on the field and Spirit of the Pharaoh is Special Summoned, his effect can be activated but it is a chain with Stumbling as Step 1 and Spirit of the Pharaoh as Step 2.
●If a Zombie monster had its Lv reduced by Cost Down, that reduction no longer applies when it is in the GY.
●If you activate Spirit of the Pharaoh's effect and Enemy Controller is chained, and control of Spirit of the Pharaoh switches, the effect is still controlled by the activator of Spirit of the Pharoah's effect.

Rulings.Cat:
● 'Spirit of the Pharaoh' can't be Normal Summoned or Set, and can't be Special Summoned EXCEPT by the effect of 'The First Sarcophagus'. So 'Spirit of the Pharaoh' can't be Special Summoned with 'Monster Reborn', etc., even if Special Summoned properly first.
● If your opponent chains 'Royal Decree' to the effect of 'The First Sarcophagus', the effect of Special Summoning is negated and 'The First Sarcophagus' is sent to the GY because that is the cost.
● If 'Banisher of the Light' is in play and you activate 'The First Sarcophagus', you can't Special Summon 'Spirit of the Pharaoh'.
● You select the Zombies when you successfully Special Summon 'Spirit of the Pharaoh', then activate his effect.
● 'Spirit of the Pharaoh''s effect targets.
● You can choose whether or not to activate 'Spirit of the Pharaoh''s effect, but if you activate it you must Special Summon at least 1 Zombie.
● If you have 'Stumbling' on the field and 'Spirit of the Pharaoh' is Special Summoned, his effect can be activated but it is a chain with 'Stumbling' as Step 1 and 'Spirit of the Pharaoh' as Step 2.
● If a Zombie had its LV reduced by 'Cost Down', that reduction no longer applies when it is in the GY.
● If you activate 'Spirit of the Pharaoh''s effect and 'Enemy Controller' is chained, and control of 'Spirit of the Pharaoh' switches, the effect is still controlled by the activator of 'Spirit of the Pharoah''s effect.

● 'Spirit of the Pharaoh' can't be Normal Summoned or Set, and can't be Special Summoned EXCEPT by the effect of 'The First Sarcophagus'. So 'Spirit of the Pharaoh' can't be Special Summoned with 'Monster Reborn', etc., even if Special Summoned properly first.

Rulings.Base:
1. "Spirit of the Pharaoh" cannot be Normal Summoned or Set, and cannot be Special Summoned EXCEPT by the effect of "The First Sarcophagus". So "Spirit of the Pharaoh" cannot be Special Summoned with "Monster Reborn", etc., even if Special Summoned properly first.
2. If your opponent chains "Royal Decree" to the effect of "The First Sarcophagus", the effect of Special Summoning is negated and "The First Sarcophagus" is sent to the GY because that is the cost.
3. If "Banisher of the Light" is in play and you activate "The First Sarcophagus", you cannot Special Summon "Spirit of the Pharaoh".
4. You select the Zombie-Type monsters when you successfully Special Summon "Spirit of the Pharaoh", then activate his effect.
5. The effect of "Spirit of the Pharaoh" targets.
6. You can choose whether or not to activate the effect of "Spirit of the Pharaoh", but if you activate it you must Special Summon at least 1 Zombie-Type monster.
7. If you have "Stumbling" on the field and "Spirit of the Pharaoh" is Special Summoned, his effect can be activated but it is a chain with "Stumbling" as Step 1 and "Spirit of the Pharaoh" as Step 2.
8. If a Zombie-Type monster had its Level reduced by "Cost Down", that reduction no longer applies when it is in the GY.
9. If you activate the effect of "Spirit of the Pharaoh" and "Enemy Controller" is chained, and control of "Spirit of the Pharaoh" switches, the effect is still controlled by the activator of the effect of "Spirit of the Pharoah".

PSCT.Edison:
© Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. 
© Must be Special Summoned by "The First Sarcophagus".
① When this card is Special Summoned: You can target up to 4 Lv2 or lower Zombie Normal Monsters in your GY; Special Summon them.
PSCT.Tengu:
© Can't be Normal Summoned/Set. 
© Must be Special Summoned by "The First Sarcophagus".
① When this card is Special Summoned: You can target up to 4 Lv2 or lower Zombie Normal Monsters in your GY; Special Summon them.

PSCT.Base: This card cannot be Normal Summoned or Set. This card cannot be Special Summoned except by the effect of "The First Sarcophagus". When this card is Special Summoned, you can Special Summon up to 4 Level 2 or lower Zombie-Type Normal Monsters from your Graveyard.
